value.title: A Close Look at Cloud-Based Machine Learning Platforms: Microsoft Azure ML, Google Vertex AI
value.excerpt: This is the second part of the ML PaaS series where we explore Azure Machine Learning services and Google’s Vertex AI platform. We follow the same framework of classifying the features and services of these platforms into the five stages of machine learning.

value.title: How Contentsquare reduced TensorFlow inference latency with TensorFlow Serving on Amazon SageMaker
value.excerpt: In this post, we present the results of a model serving experiment made by Contentsquare scientists with an innovative DL model trained to analyze HTML documents. value.title: 11 ways we're innovating with AI

value.title: The future of A.I.: 4 big things to watch for in the next few years
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence has progressed in leaps and bounds over the past decade. What's in store for the next one? Here are four things to keep an eye on.

value.title: Prosthesis powered by Google’s machine learning lets amputee drummer play naturally again
value.excerpt: Google’s machine learning technology has given an amputee drummer the ability to play again, highlighting developments in robotic prostheses.

value.title: Mythic AI gets funding to mass-produce edge chips
value.excerpt: Just six months after unveiling its first AI inferencing processor, Mythic AI has announced a new round of funding for $70 million in Series C investment to begin mass production of its chips and to develop its next generation of hardware and software products.

value.title: IBM’s Research Group Set To Simplify Enterprise AI
value.excerpt: We believe IBM is going to bring its AI research for improved power efficient AI to mainstream data centers. To effectively use its reduced precision AI hardware, it's critical that there be the right software support.

value.title: Maysam Moussalem teaches Googlers human-centered AI
value.excerpt: Originally, Maysam Moussalem dreamed of being an architect. “When I was 10, I looked up to see the Art Nouveau dome over the Galeries Lafayette in Paris, and I knew I wanted to make things like that,” she says. “Growing up between Austin, Paris, Beirut and Istanbul just fed my love of architecture.”

value.title: Google Revamps Its Cloud-Based Machine Learning Platform Yet Again
value.excerpt: With Vertex AI, Google not only unifies its AI offerings but also closes the gap with similar offerings from its key competitors.

value.title: Google I/O 2021: Being helpful in moments that matter
value.excerpt: It’s great to be back hosting our I/O Developers Conference this year. value.title: Tackling tuberculosis screening with AI
value.excerpt: Today we’re sharing new AI research that aims to improve screening for one of the top causes of death worldwide: tuberculosis (TB). value.title: Using AI to help find answers to common skin conditions
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence (AI) has the potential to help clinicians care for patients and treat disease — from improving the screening process for breast cancer to helping detect tuberculosis more efficiently. value.title: A smoother ride and a more detailed Map thanks to AI
value.excerpt: AI is a critical part of what makes Google Maps so helpful. value.title: Google Research launches MoveNet with TensorFlow.js API
value.excerpt: Google has launched its new MoveNet model with an API for TensorFlow.js to help developers create apps that can track movements. In future updates, MoveNet should be able to track multiple people.

value.title: DeepMind provides machine learning scholarships for four Wits Master's students
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence (AI) research and applications company DeepMind has donated scholarship funding for four University of the Witwatersrand (Wits) students to complete their Master's degrees in the field of machine learning (ML).

value.title: DeepMind Wants to Use AI to Transform Soccer
value.excerpt: Now, defending Premier League champion Liverpool has joined forces with DeepMind to explore the use of artificial intelligence in the soccer world. A paper by researchers at the two organizations, published today by the Journal of Artificial Intelligence ...

value.title: DeepMind Wants to Use AI to Transform Soccer
value.excerpt: The Alphabet-owned company is working with Liverpool to bring computer vision and statistical learning to the high-stakes world of sports.
